purpose: The email announces a full-time Post-Doc position at the Linz Institute of Technology for conducting software engineering research.
evidence_sentences: We are looking for a (up to three-years contract) Post-Doc for the Johannes Kepler University (JKU) Linz Institute of Technology (LIT).
The Post-Doc is expected to conduct software engineering research in the JKU / Dynatrace Austria Co-Innovation Lab.
Apply now via the link below (Deadline Aug 10) or contact me in case you have any questions.
